system.description:
Prerequisite: Pact of the Blade

Whenever you hit a creature with a weapon attack using your pact weapon, you can use this invocation to deliver an eldritch smackdown that deals an additional 1d8 force damage. This damage increases to 2d8 at 5th level, 3d8 at 9th level, 4d8 at 13th level, 5d8 at 17th level, and 6d8 at 19th level. 

Once you use this invocation, you must complete a short or long rest to use it again.
